title: I want to know name of this font
content:
Hi,  
 can anyone tell me name of this font......? its very rush & important for me....pls help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907055037im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/115226_67414371_5677.jpg)

 [‹ Can anyone help to find this font also](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907055037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44619 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help needed font ID - mabe DIN Variant? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907055037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44610 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content:
I think it’s known as ’badlyfoiled’. I may be wrong.

Seriously though, yeah — it’s Caxton. Either the Roman, or it’s just bled really badly.
Thanku friends i got it solved with ur help.
